actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
  mp.id_matiere_premiere,
  mp.nom AS nom_matiere_premiere,
  mp.description,
  mp.id_unite,
  u.nom_unite,
  u.type_unite,
  u.facteur_conversion,
  mp.prix_achat_ht,
  mp.quantite_unite
FROM newroseclaire.matieres_premieres mp
JOIN newroseclaire.unites u ON mp.id_unite = u.id_unite
WHERE mp.actif = true
ORDER BY mp.nom;
